dashboardArticles.title: Articles

importArticlesPopover.title: Import articles
importArticlesPopover.description: Please select a .xlsx, .xls, .csv file to import articles

success.title: Articles imported successfully
success.description: Your articles have been imported successfully

error.title: Error while importing articles
error.description: An error occurred while importing your articles

createArticleDialog.title: Create a new article
createArticleDialog.titleInputDescription: This is the title of your article.
createArticleDialog.categoryInputDescription: This is the category of your article.
createArticleDialog.contentInputDescription: This is the content of your article.

title.min: Title must be at least 5 characters long.
title.regex: Title must only include letters, numbers, spaces, dashes, periods, commas, exclamation points, and question marks.

content.min: Content must be at least 5 characters long.
content.regex: Content must only include allowed characters.

success.title: Article created successfully
success.description: Your article has been created successfully

error.title: Error while creating the article
error.description: An error occurred while creating your article

editArticleDialog.titleInputDescription: This is the title of your article.

editArticleDialog.contentInputDescription: This is the content of your article.

title.min: Title must be at least 5 characters long.
title.regex: Title must only include letters, numbers, spaces, dashes, periods, commas, exclamation points, and question marks.

content.min: Content must be at least 5 characters long.
content.regex: Content must only include allowed characters.

success.title: Article edited successfully
success.description: Your article has been edited successfully

error.title: Error while editing the article
error.description: An error occurred while editing your article

deleteArticleDialog.title: Delete an article
deleteArticleDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this article?

createUserDialog.title: Create a new user
createUserDialog.nameInputDescription: This is the name of your user.
createUserDialog.emailInputDescription: This is the email of your user.
createUserDialog.passwordInputDescription: This is the password of your user.
createUserDialog.roleInputDescription: This is the role of your user.

name.min: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
name.regex: Name must only include letters, numbers, spaces, dashes, periods, commas, exclamation points, and question marks.

email.email: Email must be a valid email address.

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

success.title: User created successfully
success.description: Your user has been created successfully

error.title: Error while creating the user
error.description: An error occurred while creating your user

editUserDialog.title: Edit a user
editUserDialog.nameInputDescription: This is the name of your user.
editUserDialog.emailInputDescription: This is the email of your user.
editUserDialog.oldPasswordInputDescription: This is the old password of your user.
editUserDialog.newPasswordInputDescription: This is the new password of your user.
editUserDialog.roleInputDescription: This is the role of your user.

name.min: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
name.regex: Name must only include letters, numbers, spaces, dashes, periods, commas, exclamation points, and question marks.

email.min: Email must be at least 5 characters long.
email.regex: Email must only include letters, numbers, spaces, dashes, periods, commas, exclamation points, and question marks.

oldPassword.string: Old password must not be empty.
oldPassword.min: Old password must be at least 8 characters long.
oldPassword.max: Old password must not exceed 15 characters.

newPassword.string: New password must not be empty.
newPassword.min: New password must be at least 8 characters long.
newPassword.max: New password must not exceed 15 characters.

role.min: Role must be at least 3 characters long.
role.regex: Role must only include letters, numbers, spaces, dashes, periods, commas, exclamation points, and question marks.

success.title: User edited successfully
success.description: Your user has been edited successfully

error.title: Error while editing the user
error.description: An error occurred while editing your user

deleteUserDialog.title: Delete a user
deleteUserDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

success.title: User deleted successfully
success.description: Your user has been deleted successfully

error.title: Error while deleting the user
error.description: An error occurred while deleting your user
